      • getFullTransform

        public static void getFullTransform(javax.media.j3d.TransformGroup tg,
                    javax.media.j3d.Transform3D tf)
        Computes the full transform from root to the given transform group, including the transform *in* the TG. The resulting transform can be used to find the origin of the TG by applying the transform to (0,0,0).
        Parameters:
        tg - The TG in question
        tf - Resulting transform is returned here (old transform is overwritten)

      • getRelativeTransform

        public static void getRelativeTransform(javax.media.j3d.TransformGroup locationTG,
                        javax.media.j3d.TransformGroup frameTG,
                        javax.media.j3d.Transform3D tf)
        Computes the transform that takes a point that is *local* in locationTG to the frame of reference of frameTG. If one applies the resulting transform to (0,0,0) one obtains the location of the origin of locationTG in the frame of reference of frameTG.
        Parameters:
        locationTG - The TG in question, must be (grand)child of frameTG
        frameTG - The new frame of reference, must be parent of locationTG
        tf - Resulting transform is returned here (old transform is overwritten)

      • initScene
